description:
We are 100% dedicated to Cloud Computing and offer the market a complete portfolio of solutions and services that meet the business needs of companies of any size and sector. For this reason we seek the most important partners of the cloud world as Google, Amazon Web Services and RunMyProcess offering solutions to market truly innovative and mature through the quality and scale of their global structures.
Cloud Computing requires experience in technological environments of all kinds. Requires expert support, consulting, migration and management. These are components that Dedalus developed over decades and are the reason for our success because for us, every project is unique because they are designed specifically for each client. Therefore, in addition to high technical expertise, the team of professionals Dedalus also has broad business vision to deliver the exact solution that meets the needs of our customers.
